SN Payment Type Period Valid SP SP Tag MUP Top-Up Top-Up Tag Case Unpaid OP Paid Entitled {{ i + 1 }} {{ record.paymentType }} {{ record.payrollStartDt | date:'dd-MM-yyyy (HHmm)' }}
{{ record.payrollEndDt | date:'dd-MM-yyyy (HHmm)' }} {{ record.validInd }} {{ record.spAmount | currency:'SGD' : '' }} {{ record.spTag }} {{ record.mupAmount | currency:'SGD' : '' }} {{ record.nsTopUpAmount | currency:'SGD' : '' }} {{ record.nsTopUpTag }}
{{ id }}
{{ record.unpaid | currency:'SGD' : '' }} {{ record.op }} {{ record.op }} {{ record.paid | currency:'SGD' : '' }} {{ record.entitled | currency:'SGD' : '' }} No records found. {{ nsmanInfo.nric }} {{ nsmanInfo.rank }} {{ nsmanInfo.fullName }} import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { LazyLoadEvent } from 'primeng/api'; import { Ns2HttpService } from 'app/shared/service/ns2-http.service'; import { CustomToastService } from 'app/layouts/service/customtoast.service'; import { DateUtilsService } from 'app/core/util/date-utils.service'; import { ExportUtilsService } from 'app/core/util/export-utils.service'; import { EnquiryNSmanService } from 'app/enquiry/nsman/service/enquiry-nsman.service'; import { Table } from 'primeng/table'; import { EnqTrainingTab } from 'app/enquiry/nsman/model/nsman-tabs.model'; import { NSmanPersonalInfo } from 'app/enquiry/nsman/model/nsman.model'; @Component({ selector: 'n2-nsman-training-tab', templateUrl: './nsman-training-tab.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nsman-training-tab.component.scss'] }) export class NsmanTrainingTabComponent implements OnInit { @Input() nsmanInfo: NSmanPersonalInfo; displayRecordDialog: any = { display: false }; // LazyLoad variables totalRecords?: number; loading?: boolean; pageData: { currentPage: number } = { currentPage: 0 } pageSize = 10; lazyLoadEvent: LazyLoadEvent; payrollId: string; trainingList: EnqTrainingTab[] = []; constructor( private ns2HttpService: Ns2HttpService, private toastService: CustomToastService, private dateUtilsService: DateUtilsService, private exportUtilsService: ExportUtilsService, private enquiryNSmanService: EnquiryNSmanService, ) {} ngOnInit(): void { // } load(event: LazyLoadEvent): void { setTimeout(() => { this.loading = true; this.lazyLoadEvent = event; const options = this.ns2HttpService.convertLazyEvent(event, this.pageData, this.pageSize); options.params = options.params.append("nric", this.nsmanInfo.nric); this.enquiryNSmanService.getTrainingTab(options).subscribe(resp => { if (resp.body?.data?.content) { this.trainingList = resp.body.data.content; this.totalRecords = resp.body.data.totalElements; } else { this.trainingList = []; this.totalRecords = 0; } this.loading = false; }); }, 0); } onPage(event: any): void { this.pageSize = event.rows; this.pageData.currentPage = event.first / event.rows; } onOpenRecordDialog(id: string): void { this.payrollId = id; this.displayRecordDialog.display = true; } onCloseRecordDialog(): void { this.payrollId = ''; } exportCSV(dataTable: Table): void { const options = this.ns2HttpService.convertLazyEvent(this.lazyLoadEvent, 0, this.totalRecords); options.params = options.params.append("nric", this.nsmanInfo.nric); this.enquiryNSmanService.getTrainingTab(options).subscribe( resp => { if (resp.body?.data?.content) { const data = resp.body?.data?.content; const columns = [ { field: 'sn', header: 'SN', index: 0 }, { field: 'paymentType', header: 'Payment Type', index: 1 }, { field: 'period', header: 'Period', index: 2 }, { field: 'validInd', header: 'Valid', index: 3 }, { field: 'spAmount', header: 'SP', index: 4 }, { field: 'spTag', header: 'SP Tag', index: 5 }, { field: 'mupAmount', header: 'MUP', index: 6 }, { field: 'nsTopUpAmount', header: 'Top-Up', index: 7 }, { field: 'nsTopUpTag', header: 'Top-Up Tag', index: 8 }, { field: 'caseId', header: 'Case', index: 9 }, { field: 'unpaid', header: 'Unpaid', index: 10 }, { field: 'op', header: 'OP', index: 11 }, { field: 'paid', header: 'Paid', index: 12 }, { field: 'entitled', header: 'Entitled', index: 13 }, ]; const dtoList: any[] = []; console.log("data", data); data.forEach((record: EnqTrainingTab, index: number) => { const dto = { sn: index + 1, paymentType: record.paymentType, period: `${String(this.dateUtilsService.formatStrDate(record.payrollStartDt, "DD-MM-YYYY (HHmm)"))} to ${String(this.dateUtilsService.formatStrDate(record.payrollEndDt, "DD-MM-YYYY (HHmm)"))}`, validInd: record.validInd, spAmount: record.spAmount, spTag: record.spTag, mupAmount: record.mupAmount, nsTopUpAmount: record.nsTopUpAmount, nsTopUpTag: record.nsTopUpTag, caseId: record.caseId, unpaid: record.unpaid, op: record.op, paid: record.paid, entitled: record.entitled } dtoList.push(dto); }); this.exportUtilsService.exportCSV(dataTable, dtoList, resp.body.data.totalElements, columns, "Enquiry Training Tab"); } }, error => { console.log(error.error?.error_desc); this.loading = false; }) } }
